description:
Fren is branded an outlaw when he leaves the underworld to help save Ouken. When Whiteking grows fat after the captain neglects to care for her, only one thing can whip her back into shape. Hokuro joins the military to repay Bojji`s kindness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meifu no Okite / Koi Suru Hakuba / Yasashiki Heishi Hokuro
The Law of the Underworld / A White Horse in Love / The Gentle Soldier, Hokuro
冥府の掟 / 恋する白馬 / 優しき兵士ホクロ
